Of all gunblades (a sword-gun weapon), the finest model is the Lionheart. It requires rare items to be remodeled to its highest quality. Good luck!
Next, we show you the finest projectile weapon, the Shooting Star. Don`t let the angel wing motif fool you. It`s a deadly weapon.
Exeter comes to mind when considering high- powered guns. Despite its simple design, it`s a fine weapon made of many rare metals.
This Strange Vision is famous for its ability to hit a target with perfect accuracy. It`s also famous for its rarity.
This time, we introduce a basic weapon. The gunblade`s original model is this Revolver. What it lacks in power, it more than makes up for with its reliability.
A punch can be a deadly weapon, but it can be made even more effective by wearing these, the Metal Knuckle. These gloves are widely used.
Even a weakling can cause serious damage with this type of nunchaku, but they`re also hard to use. This Flail has long been a favorite for beginners.
Whips are effective against enemies that are close or far away. This Chain Whip has a simple design, but is very reliable in battle.
An improvement in power over the Revolver, Shear Trigger uses the same blade as the Revolver, but the gun aspect is now more powerful.
With the Maverick, the combatant can deliver direct punching blows to the enemy. The gloves are made of black leather and have metal plates on the knuckles.
Weapons that can be used from a distance have many advantages. The Pinwheel is one of the more basic projectile weapons.
Guns have the advantage of range, but damage is less compared to swords. The Valiant uses powerful bullets to cause damage comparable to a sword.
This Cutting Trigger is the latest model of gunblade, made by replacing the blade of the Revolver with the powerful Cutting Sword.
Valkyrie is a projectile weapon that can fly straight at the enemy using its stabilizing fins. The blade is extremely deadly.
The Ulysses lacks style, but is a quality rifle with tremendous firepower. The inelegant design was necessary to absorb the powerful recoil after firing.
This whip, the Slaying Tail, is known for its tremendous speed and power. It is named after Sleipner, the horse of the legendary GF, Odin.
The Flame Saber got its name from its red blade. This gunblade is very similar to the Shear Trigger. The only difference is that it has the Cutting Trigger`s handle.
The Gauntlet is covered with layers of steel. It is a fighting glove for delivering heavy rather than smooth blows.
The ends of the Morning Star were equipped with spiked metal balls to cause more damage. It is a plain weapon, similar to nunchaku, but it is fairly effective.
The Red Scorpion is a unique whip made of rare materials. It`s strength comes from the dragon skin, while it`s flexibility comes from the Ochu tentacle.
The Twin Lance is a gunblade forged with two blades. The two blades work synergistically to inflict severe damage. The only drawback is its heavy weight.
The Rising Sun is similar to a circular saw. It is made by upgrading the Pinwheel. It is capable of slicing into enemies like a spinning saw and dealing a devastating blow.
Contrary to the Ulysses, the Bismarck has a sleek look. The rifle is very handy and light, but in turn, requires more physical strength and energy to handle its powerful recoil.
The Crescent Wish is an extremely powerful nunchaku. Some rare items are required to forge this weapon.
The Punishment looks almost identical to the Twin Lance, but it is lighter and more powerful. The only gunblade more powerful than this is the Lionheart.
Ehrgeiz is the most powerful fighting glove. It allows the wearer to deliver optimal hits based on his or her ability.
The Cardinal is the latest line of projectile weapons. The wide fins provide more stability and accuracy compared to the Valkyrie. Its greater accuracy causes more damage.
Save the Queen is the most powerful whip in the world. It is made with Malboro`s tentacles which are the most ideal material for making whips.
Combat King 001 Sea Power! Dolphin Blow

Do you guys know what a Dolphin is? It`s an adorable gray mammal that lives in the ocean. This skill, called the Dolphin Blow, draws out the secret power of the dolphin. It`ll give the enemy a hell of a show!
Study the skill carefully. Remember, always use it for a good cause, ok!?
Combat King 002 Power Blow! Meteor Strike
Picking up your enemy and slamming them on the ground probably does the most damage. That`s what Meteor Strike accomplishes. And, of course, the bigger they are, the harder they fall.
This is one of the hardest moves to do, but study it carefully and you`ll eventually get it. Remember, always use it for a good cause, ok!?
Combat King 003 Final blow! Meteor Barret

As a fighter, you will occasionally encounter near- death experiences. Using Meteor Barret in these situations may be your only chance to emerge victorious. It is a skill that throws all your energy against the enemy.
Being a finishing blow, it inflicts tremendous damage against the enemy. Remember, always use it for a good cause, ok!?
Combat King 004 Aerial Finish! Different Beat
The enemy can`t do anything if you lift them up in the air. With Different Beat, you can kick the enemy up in the air and keep kicking them while they remain completely defenseless.
This is really an efficient skill so it`s worthwhile to get it down. Remember, always use it for a good cause, ok!?
Combat King 005 Super Dash! My Final Heaven

E = 1/2 x M x V x V E: Energy. M: Mass. V: Velocity. Apparently, if you increase the velocity, the energy goes up. This skill is based on this physics equation. At a velocity near the speed of light, you can do major damage!
Get this skill, My Final Heaven, down and check out the high-speed thrashing! Remember, always use it for a good cause, ok!?

Welcome to Pet Pals. We bring the latest pet news to dog lovers. Your dog learns a trick to damage enemies in this issue. Your dog comes to your rescue when you are in grave danger. It`s called... Strike! As you dog lovers already know, walk with your dog to help him learn this trick.

Have you ever wished your pet could rescue you in battle? This is just the trick for your dog to learn! Your dog finds and uses potions and other cures on a member who`s near KO with this trick. It is called Recover! A very nice trick, indeed.

Research shows a relationship between the moon and your dog. Do you know how your dog can use the power of the moon to help you? It`s... Invincible Moon! The moon`s mysterious power can make all allies invincible. Do a lot of walking with your dog to help him learn this trick!

Have you ever been KO`d by a monster? Even reviving doesn`t help, because you get KO`d right back. To answer your desperate call for help, use Reverse! Your dog finds Phoenix Downs to revive KO`d party members in battle.

Item hunting! Sounds like a daunting task? But it`s true that you need items to do anything. So let`s have your dog learn another trick. It`s... Search! Your dog finds items while you are fighting. Be sure to praise your dog when s/he finds an item!

Have you ever wanted to achieve a goal together with your pet? Make it come true, using Wishing Star! Attack enemies together! The power of love multiplies your powers by 10 to 20 times to defeat your enemies. Try it, you`ll like it!
Occult Fan I Exclusive Mysterious Monster Death!!!
Odell Burk(67) of Timber was tending to his field when he found a dead monster after hearing a loud impact sound.
Mr. Burk said it occured while he was making a fence with steel pipes.
On the left is a photo shot in Esthar. Take a look at the unidentified flying object in the center.
Have you ever seen any monster or airplane like this!? Some say it may be Esthar`s secret weapon, but residents of the area say it appears when there is a major Malboro outbreak.
Occult Fan III Magic World Exclusive
Look at this picture. This is a confidential photo of what is assumed to be a ring that summons a GF. Legend goes that it was a ring that belonged to a royal
family. Its name and whereabouts are unknown. The legend says you must have 666 items to summon the GF.
Occult Fan IV Exclusive Report Unidentified Flying Object Revealed!?
Our research on the deadly flying object revealed that a Devil (left) may be flying and attacking people.
Another theory calls it an alien (right).
Neither has been proven, but people that were attacked all owned ST Full Recovery Medicine.
A status window showing the character, HP, and ATB gauges is displayed on the battle screen. Characters can act once the ATB gauge is full.
Commands are displayed when the ATB is full. Use the directional buttons to choose. Press to confirm the command. Press while the cursor is on-screen to see a help message.
To use Magic, select one magic and choose your target. The number in stock is indicated next to the magic`s name. The indicates that the magic is junctioned.
When Item is chosen, select the item and its target. The number next to each item shows how many items the party has.
GF summons a GF junctioned to a character. Select a GF and its target. The number next to the GF`s name shows its HP.
Draw extracts magic from enemies. Choose a target and magic, then Stock or Cast. Stock will stock the magic and Cast will cast the magic.
When running low on HP, may appear next to Attack. Press the right directional button. This new command is more powerful than the usual Attack. This is a Limit Break.
-Press to choose your target from a window. -Hold and to escape, though there are some battles from which you cannot escape. -EXP is gained even if you escape, as long as you damaged the enemy.
The cards originated when a psychic named Orlan modified these tarot cards for games. The game became popular with soldiers passing time between battles.
As its popularity spread, each region developed its own rules and picture variations.
1.Picture 2.Numbers Correspond to the 4 sides of the card. (1:weak - A:strong) 3.Element Some rules allow the players to use its elemental property.
1.Battle area Place cards here one at a time. 2.Elemental Some rules indicate elements on the board.
Cards are placed in turn, and the player with the most cards when all 9 areas are filled wins.

Choose 5 cards before you begin. Pay attention to numbers and elements.
1.Card name 2.# in stock 3.Page number 4.Card chosen
Same turns over cards that have same # values on 2 or more sides. In the example, #s 4 and 1 are adjacent to top and left sides. This turns over the top and left cards.

Plus means that cards adding to the same # on more than 2 adjacent sides are turned over. In the example, the cards placed add up to 7 on the top and left sides. The cards on top and left are turned over.
Cards turned over using Same or Plus turn over adjacent cards in Combo. In the example, red will be turned over because 1 of the 2 cards turned over is a larger #.
Same Wall uses Battle Area wall (the frame) as 1 of card`s 4 sides when using Same rule. Wall is assumed to have 'A` value on all sides.

Elemental changes the # value of the card depending on the elemental property. When a card and slot match elemental properties, the # value increases by 1. If elements don`t match, the card loses 1 from the original # value.
Open All cards face up. Random Cards chosen at random. Sudden Death Play until someone wins.

Cards are traded when the game is over. The winner takes 1 card from the loser in the basic trade rule One. There are many trade rules besides One. Pay attention to trade rules before you begin a game.
Direct Take cards you turned over, but lose cards turned over by the opponent. Diff Winner takes the number of cards by which s/he won. All The winner takes all the cards from the loser.

Mog, a MiniMog, wants to go treasure hunting with his friends. But the treasure is in the 'Scary Mountain`. Everybody tells Mog, ”We`re not going! It`s too scary!“
But Mog wants to go so badly. No one can stop him now!
Mog finally decided to go by himself. Then... Two days passed... Three days passed. Mog did not come home. Moomba and Cactuar imagined Mog being barbecued by the
Demon King. ”We have to go help Mog with Chicobo!“
Moomba said, ”I`ll find weapons!“ Cactuar said, ”I`ll find treasures!“ What`s Chicobo doing with a TV and Fishing Pole?

0xC4 What is Solo-RPG!? 1/8 Chocobo World is a Solo-RPG. Just as the word ”Solo“ implies, it is a game all by itself. Combined with the word RPG, it means it plays an RPG by itself. So the game can progress on its own. Not to worry, though! Chicobo awaits your command in wait mode!
0xC4 0xC4 Basic Operation 2/8 Walk Screen 2,3,4,5: Changes direction Menu Screen 1: Goes back to Walk Screen 2,3: Choose menu option 4,5: Scroll menu Battle Screen 4,5: Push to speed up ATB.

0xC4 0xC40xC40xC4 Walk Screen 3/8 1: Game progresses on the Walk Screen and stops on the Menu Screen. 2: Chicobo wanders off when HP aren`t full. Scold it with the enter button! 3: Events happen here!

0xC4 0xC4 Event Screen 4/8 1: Cactuar gives you an item. 2: Acquired items. 3: Moomba gives you a weapon. 4: Select a weapon. 5: Battle is also an event. 6: Hope you find Mog! 7: ON: You control Chicobo. OFF: Chicobo`s on his own.

0xC4 0xC40xC40xC40xC4 Battle Screen 5/8 1: HP: Battle ends when HP reads 0. 2: ATB: Attacks when this bar reads 0. 3: If you find Mog, go to the Menu Screen 4: and select STAND BY. He`ll help you when you`re in danger! 5: Receive magic stones by winning battles. Bingo levels you up!

0xC4 0xC4 Map Screen and Movement 6/8 1: Map Screen: Dots show events, and flickers show Chicobo. Events occur when they meet! 2: Set direction with up/down buttons. 3: Map number: level up to next map. 4: Time: ChocoboWorld time. 5: Move Screen: Use up/down button to set. Higher number covers more ground.

0xC4 0xC40xC40xC4 Status Screen 7/8 1: WPN: Randomly chooses 1 of the 4 damage points in battle. 2: Chicobo`s level 3: Current HP/Maximum HP 4: ID signifies Chicobo`s rank. 5: Check number of items collected. A is the best of the 4 items. Find out what it is back in FFVIII.

0xC40xC4Optical Communication Screen 8/8 1: Neutral position. 2: Receiver selects the bottom. 3: Sender selects the top. 4: Operate like any other battle. The Chicobo on the right is yours. 5: Take your opponent`s ID if you win. Compare with your own. Select it like a weapon.

1: Select World to move Chicobo into ChocoboWorld. 2: Select Home to move Chicobo back into FFVIII world. 3: If you want to start over from where you left off, select Do over. 4: How to play: This tutorial.

This executes Junction related commands.
3Junction Menu 4GFJunction 5Magic Junction /Off :Auto !Setting Ability

There are 2 types of Junction: GF Junction and Magic Junction.
Choose Junction command in the menu and the party member to junction. The screen switches to the Junction menu. Ability setting is done on the same Junction screen.

Signifies junctioning a GF to an ally. Choose Junction on the junction menu, then choose the GF command that appears. When GF command is selected, a screen shows all GF acquired. Select a GF. More than one GF can be junctioned to one ally. GF junctioned to the current character show up in gray, while GF junctioned to other allies show up as ghost text.

Signifies junctioning magic to an ally. There are 5 categories:
6Stat Junction 7Elemental Attack Junction 8Elemental Defense Junction 9Status Attack Junction %Status Defense Junction
Signifies junctioning magic to HP, Vit, etc. to raise their value. The effect is different for each magic spell, but any magic can be junctioned.

Signifies junctioning magic to Elem-Atk. Only magic with an elemental property can be junctioned. Once junctioned, Attack has an elemental property. 100% makes the elemental stat perfect. When attacking an enemy that receives twice the damage by Fire attacks; with fire stat 100%, character inflicts twice the damage, but with 50%, damage only amounts to 1.5 times.

Signifies junctioning magic to Elem-Def. Only magic with an elemental property can be junctioned. This elemental junction has no effect on the magic the character is using. Defense stat is shown as a %, with a max of 100% against that element. Once the stat passes 100%, the character absorbs the attacks at maximum of 100%.

Signifies junctioning magic to ST-Atk. Only magic with status changing effects can be junctioned. Once junctioned, Attack command has a status property. Status-change stat is shown as a %, with a maximum of 100%. Status change may occur depending on the enemy`s status defense power.

Signifies junctioning magic to ST-Def. Only magic with defense against status changes can be junctioned. This defense junction has no effect on the magic the character is using. Junction gives protection from that status change. Defense stat is shown as a %, with a max of 100%. Certain attacks can bypass even a 100% defense stat, so it is not a perfect defense.

Signifies taking off magic and GF that are junctioned. There are two commands to do this.
Magic Leaves the GF alone, while taking off all magic that is junctioned.
All Takes off all junctioned magic and GF.

This junctions magic automatically. There are 3 different commands, depending on the ability you want to emphasize.
Atk Emphasizes fighting ability. Mag Emphasizes magic ability. Def Emphasizes defensive ability.

This sets an ability to a character. Junctioned GF abilities can also be set.
Up to 3 command abilities can be set in the command box. Up to 2 Character or Party abilities can be set in the ability box. However, there is a GF ability that allows 4 abilities to be set.

This allows use of items in menu mode.
Choose the party member or GF after choosing an item.
Items shown in gray cannot be used in menu.

This automatically sorts items.
Items are sorted by type.
Items missing are ignored in this process.

This allows you to rearrange items by preference.
After choosing an item, select a location for it.
Items switch place or places themselves in an empty space.

Items are placed according to preference, for use in battle.
It is the same as Rearrange, the difference being that item placement is optimized for battle. Items switch place or places with an empty space automatically.

This allows you to use magic in the menu screen. Choose an ally, then select the magic and a target to activate the magic. However, magic that causes damage or that would have no effect in the menu is not activated. KO`d, Petrified, or Silenced allies cannot use magic, even in the menu. At this time, pressing after choosing a magic discards that magic.

This exchanges magic between allies. Choose an ally, then select the magic and choose a character to exchange with. If the target already owns the same magic, Give All/Take All/Split are displayed. If the opposite is true, choose magic to switch or choose from Give All or Split when choosing a blank slot. To discard it, choose magic and press .

This transfers all magic from one ally to another. Choose the ally receiving Magic, then choose the one giving, and the command is executed. No single type of Magic can have more than 100 in its stock, nor can a character have more than 32 different types of magic at once. Excess magic is retained by the ally giving the magic.

Allows placement of magic according to preference for use in battle.
Magic switches place with another, or sets itself in a blank slot. You can also discard magic by pressing after selecting the magic.

Arrange magic in the Magic Screen for battle.
·Manual .Attack·Restore·Indirect ,Attack·Indirect·Restore ~Restore·Attack·Indirect “Restore·Indirect·Attack ”Indirect·Attack·Restore 'Indirect·Restore·Attack

Allows you to rearrange the magic freely. When exchanging magic, they switch places. When exchanging magic with a blank slot, they switch places, leaving the old slot blank.
Discard magic by pressing .
Rearrange magic by type in the following order: Attack Magic· Recovery Magic· Indirect Magic.
Rearrange magic by type in the following order: Attack Magic· Indirect Magic· Recovery Magic.
Rearrange magic by type in the following order: Recovery Magic· Attack Magic· Indirect Magic.
Rearrange magic by type in the following order: Recovery Magic· Indirect Magic· Attack Magic.
Rearrange magic by type in the following order: Indirect Magic· Attack Magic· Recovery Magic.
Rearrange magic by type in the following order: Indirect Magic· Recovery Magic· Attack Magic.

See information on a character. 4 status screens will be displayed.
1: Shows HP, Level, EXP, and Abilities. 2: Elem-Atk, Elem-Def, ST-Atk, ST-Def screen. 3: Shows compatibility with GF 4: Shows Special Skills. This screen differs with each ally. Some can choose attack auto function.

See information on GF. When selected, a GF`s status screen is displayed to show HP, Level, etc.
Choose Learn in the status screen to check which abilities have been learned, and choose an ability to learn.
This allows you to use a GF`s Menu Ability. When chosen, all learned abilities are shown. Choose one to activate.

Switch party members. Also transfers corresponding junctions.
ASwitch Member BJunction Exchange

Switch party members.
Select characters with the cursor to switch party members.
At times, characters cannot be switched even if they are displayed.

Transfers the characters` magic, junctioned GF, and set abilities to the selected character.
You are free to switch transfers by selecting characters that are displayed.

See information about the game. There are 8 categories: Basic Operation Controller operation. Battle Operation Fighting basics. Online Help Explanation of various features. Card Game Rules Explanation of card game. TEST Take SeeD Written Test to raise Rank. Review Reviews all passed SeeD Tests. Icon Explanation Explanation about icons. Saves the game at either a Save Point or on the World Map.
You need a GAME FOLDER with 1 or more empty blocks.
Use the 'Chocobo World` here.
HATB Battle IBasic Operation JAttack KItem LMagic MDraw NGF OLimit Break PType of Limit Break

ATB stands for Active Time Battle. With time running during battle, enemies keep attacking even while the current character waits. Thus, it is important to make decisions quickly during battle.
ATB can be set to Wait in the Config screen. Wait mode gives more time to decide on a command.

Once the ATB gauge is full, the command window opens up. Select a command to execute. Commands shown are Attack, and other abilities set in Junction.
Commands like Magic , GF, and Item must be set in Junction to use in battle.
Attack with a weapon. Elem-Atk and ST-Atk effects take place.
Uses items in inventory. Choose an item to use and select its target to activate the item. The window only shows items that can be used in battle.
Uses magic in inventory. Choose magic and select its target to activate. Magic decreases with use. Junction effects go down if junctioned magic is used.
Draws magic out of enemies. Either Stock to put in inventory or Cast it.

Summons GF. When chosen, the character begins summoning, and is unable to act until the GF is summoned. GF receives all damage while it`s being summoned, but when its HP goes down to 0, GF is KO`d and the summon stops. Status changes affect the character. If the character is KO`d while summoning, the summoning process also stops. The GF appears when summoning is complete.
Appears before being KO`d. Each ally has a different skill.

eHow GFs Level Up fGF`s Ability gCompatibility with GF hGF`s Skill

GF gains experience when junctioned allies fight in battle. GF levels up with EXP gained, just as party members do. If multiple GF are junctioned to 1 ally, EXP is divided among GF, and may slow their levels from going up.

When you set an ability for a GF to learn in the GF screen, that GF gains AP in battle. Once the required number of AP is gained, the ability is learned. GF automatically begins learning the next ability. To choose a specific ability, go to the menu GF screen. GF also learns abilities from items, but it can only learn a maximum of 22 abilities.

A higher compatibility stat shortens the summoning time. Compatibility goes up or down depending on the junctioned ally`s actions. Sometimes compatibility with a certain GF goes up, while it goes down with other GF. Some items change the compatibility stat.

Junction equips GF and Magic. Referred to as: Junctioning GF to a character. ”Magic junctioned to a character“ and ”GF junctioned to a character“ fall under this category. Junction enables a character to use Magic and summon GF.

GF signifies Guardian Force.
As allies, they provide the ability to use magic and commands. They can also be summoned to fight in a battle.
GF also gains levels with EXP as you do, and learn abilities with AP.

EXP signifies experience points gained in battle by characters and GF. Levels go up after gaining EXP. Damaging an enemy gives EXP. The amount of EXP received changes according to the difference in character and enemy level. Higher level enemies are worth more, lower level enemies are worth less. The character or the GF to give the final blow receives bonus EXP.

AP signifies Ability Point.
GF receive AP by defeating enemies. AP is used by GF to learn abilities. Once enough AP are gained, GF learns the ability being studied.

Attacks are categorized into physical and magic attacks. Physical attack means damaging an enemy with a sword or other physical weapons. Magic attack means damaging an enemy with magical force.
These differences come into play in order to attack enemies effectively.

Every character carries magic. Magic stock decreases when used. Raise stats by junctioning magic to them.
There are 3 ways to obtain magic: ·Draw it from enemies. ·Draw it from draw points. ·Refine it from items.

One of the battle commands. This command allows allies to draw magic from enemies. When drawing, choose either Stock to store the magic, or Cast to use it. A character at a high level can draw magic more efficiently than a character at a low level. Some magic cannot be drawn unless a character is at a high level.
Stock is one of the draw commands. The command allows characters to store drawn magic for future use. It is possible to draw up to 9 units of magic per draw.
Cast is one of the draw commands. The command allows casting of drawn magic. The effect of the magic on the target is random. Draw and cast can only use 1 unit of magic.
A limit break is a special skill characters can use in dire situations. Each character has his/her own special attacks. These moves do a lot of damage against an enemy.
Every character has 9 stats: Hit Points, Strength, Vitality, Magic, Spirit, Speed, Evade, Hit, and Luck. The values assigned to the stats reflect their level.
HP signifies Hit Points. HP represents the life force of the character. Zero HP represents KO.
The value of Strength determines the degree of damage caused by a physical attack. The higher the Strength, the greater the damage to the enemy.
The value of Vitality determines the degree of damage a character can endure from a physical attack. A character with high Vitality suffers less damage from physical attacks.

The value of Magic determines the degree of damage caused by a magic attack. Higher Magic causes more magical damage. The chance of successfully casting magic that cause status abnormalities becomes higher if your magic level is high. A high Magic level also allows you to restore more HP with healing magic like Cure.
The value of Spirit determines the degree of damage a character can endure from a magic attack. A character with high Spirit suffers less damage from magic attacks.
The value of Speed determines the speed of the character`s ATB meter. It takes the character a shorter time to act if this value is high.
Luck affects numerous actions of the character in the game. For example, having a higher value for Luck is an advantage during battle.
The value for Evade determines the character`s ability to dodge physical attacks. Characters that have high Evade can dodge physical attacks more easily.
The value for Hit determines the accuracy of a physical attack. Accuracy increases as the Hit level increases. However, your target`s evade level can affect the accuracy of your physical attack.

One of the GF abilities learned through acquiring AP. Ability enables characters to use commands and special powers, but you must junction GF first.
There are many abilities with different functions, in roughly 6 categories.
6Junction Abilities 7Command Abilities 8Character Abilities 9Party Abilities %GF Abilities /Menu Abilities
·These abilities allows junctioning of magic to stats, elements, and status. ·Junction a GF that has learned the ability and set character ability to activate it. ·Signified by the icon in the menu.
·Allows selection of commands in battle. ·Junction a GF that has learned the ability and set character ability to activate it. ·Signified by the icon in the menu.
·Abilities that give specialized powers. ·Junction a GF that has learned the ability and set character ability to activate it. ·Signified by the icon in the menu.
·Abilities that give the party special powers. ·Junction a GF that has learned the ability and set character ability to activate it. ·Signified by the icon in the menu.
·Abilities that power up GF. ·Have GF learn the ability to activate it. ·Signified by the icon in the menu.
·Abilities that take effect in the menu. ·Have GF learn the ability to activate it. ·Signified by the icon on the menu.

Elemental is a physical attribute. There are Fire, Ice, Thunder, Earth, Poison, Wind, Water, and Holy elements. This means that Fire magic has Fire properties, Ice monsters have ice properties, etc. Damage varies depending on elemental properties.
There is also a non-elemental property. Non-elemental is not influenced by other elements.

Signifies junctioning magic to Elem-Atk. Only magic with an elemental property can be junctioned. Once junctioned, Attack has an elemental property. An elemental stat is at maximum at 100%. When attacking an enemy that is susceptible to Fire attacks, a character inflicts twice the damage if that character`s Fire stat is at 100%. But at 50%, damage only amounts to 1.5 times.

Elem-Def signifies Elemental Defense, which sets an elemental property to your defense. Certain elemental attacks can be defended against depending on your Elem-Def element. Fire Elem-Def protects against fire attacks. Fire attacks can heal characters who are completely immune to fire. Characters who are weak against fire are easily damaged by fire attacks.

Status signifies status effects, such as Poison and Petrify. Status Change means change in a character`s status. Besides status like Poison and Petrify, which have negative effects, there are status changes like Protect and Double, which benefit the character. Status changes occur to both enemies and allies.

ST-Atk signifies attacks with status change or which have status change added to them. After setting status change to an attack, the attack will change an enemy`s status. Most magic has a status change, such as Sleep, which causes the Sleep status.

ST-Def signifies status defense, either already in use, or actually setting a status to defense. This defends against certain status changes. If attacked by Petrify while the defense is set against Petrify, a status change doesn`t occur.

Target Single Effect Absorbs HP. Explanation ·Draining from Zombies and Undead monsters can inflict damage. ·Target takes no damage if the character is also Undead. ·Make with Supt Mag-RF. Junction Effect ·Raises Vit and Spr. ·ST-Atk or ST-Def gains Drain.

Target Single Effect Causes Poison, Silence, Darkness. Explanation ·Make with ST Mag-RF. Junction Effect ·Raises Str and Mag. ·ST-Atk gains Poison, Silence, Darkness. ·ST-Def gains Poison, Silence, Darkness, and Curse.

Target Single Effect Causes Berserk. Explanation ·Attack command is chosen automatically, and target continues fighting. ·Make with ST Mag-RF. Junction Effect ·Raises Str and Mag. ·ST-Atk or ST-Def gains Berserk.
Target Single Effect Causes Float. Explanation ·Target evades Earth damage. Junction Effect ·Raises Vit and Spr. ·Elem-Def gains Earth.
Target Single Effect Causes Zombie. Explanation ·During Zombie, Potion and Cure have no effect. ·Make with L Mag-RF. Junction Effect ·Raises Vit and Spr. ·ST-Atk or ST-Def gains Zombie.
Target Single Effect Non-elemental damage; also causes Vit 0. Explanation ·Target receives damage under Vit 0. ·Make with ST Mag-RF. Junction Effect ·Raises Vit.

Target Single Effect Scans target`s information. Explanation ·If you select Once in Config, it will show the complete scan screen only once. ·If you select Always in Config, it will always show the complete scan screen. Junction Effect ·Small junction effect.

A country on the world`s smallest continent. Known for its temperate climate and warm people. Balamb Garden adds a school-town feel to this country.
A cavern near Balamb Garden where a Fire element GF lives.
A small country on the eastern coast of Galbadia continent (formerly Dollet). Remnants of an ancient empire.

A city located south of Dollet in the forest area. It was an independent country before neighboring country Galbadia invaded 18 years ago. There are numerous resistance groups fighting for independence to this day.
All forms of communication now use HD cables. No radio transmissions are used. Timber TV Station keeps its radio systems, waiting for the day radio transmission is restored.

Ruled under the military dictatorship of President Vinzer Deling, this country continues to expand its territory. Countless invasions of other countries are attempted, but most are deterred by SeeD. Deling City is its capital.

Located north of Deling City; the burial place of Dollet Empire`s last emperor. The tomb remains nameless due to the ancient belief that calling a dead king by his name brings bad luck. There are uncomfirmed reports that a GF resides inside, as well as other monsters.
A small town outside of Galbadia. It is actually a small village. Sorceress Adel of Esthar ordered attacks on this village several times.
Located in the desert south of Deling City, all people deemed dangerous by the government are sent to this facility. It has become a symbol of President Deling`s fascist policies.

Galbadia`s long-range missile base. As the only country to own long range missiles with the exception of Esthar, they pose a major security threat to the world. It is believed that the missiles are armed with a target-lock mechanism. The details are unknown.
A railroad that connected the East and West continents. Completed about the time war broke out, it was only in use a short time. Since then it has been derelict.
A station located in the center of Horizon Bridge. It`s now a haven for expatriates who refused to have their skills exploited by the government.
A country on the northern continent. Due to the harsh climate, Moombas and the Shumi tribe are the only occupants. Trabia Garden students and faculty also reside here.
Founded by people who immigrated to a continent east of Centra around the same time Dollet Empire was founded. The mild climate and temperament of the people soon gave way to scientific advancement.

Started the Sorceress War and fought against the world under Adel`s rule. Their sorceress and their scientific powers posed a worldwide threat. After abruptly declaring an end to the war, Esthar closed its borders and has kept its silence ever since. No details are known.

Governed by President Laguna and his aides. Due to their concern over Dr. Odine`s inventions having a negative effect on the state of world security, they closed off their country for 17 years. It is very likely that President Laguna will be criticized for keeping silent for so long.
A station on the Esthar side of Horizon Bridge. It is currently abandoned.
A lake on the Esthar continent. What used to be a beautiful lake is now a barren field. It`s speculated that Esthar`s experiments led to the lake`s destruction.
A world of monsters. Many works of art and epics about the moon throughout history are evidence of its mystical powers.

A man-made mobile island for marine life research. Disappeared mysteriously after much wandering. Since the facility members are still alive, it is assumed to be concealed intentionally.
3015 Found a strong energy field 4141 Call this place Deep Sea Deposit 4242 Seal off Deep Sea Deposit
Marine Research Island`s last excavation site. Believed to be an ocean floor ruin. There is a note saying: 4127 Travel by Underwater Tower.

By examining the Draw Points in the field and on the world map, you can draw magic. The Draw Points on the World Map are completely hidden. Examine odd-looking areas carefully.

A complete mystery. Various states of ”present“ are believed to become compressed. Sorceress` power from many generations may cross over to give 1 sorceress great strength. No one knows what effect this may have on regular human beings.

Balamb Garden was founded 12 years ago, followed by Galbadia and Trabia Gardens. Each Garden has an administrator, called Master, and a headmaster. Balamb Garden`s Headmaster Cid was the founder of the Garden.

Balamb Garden`s mercenary force. Students 15 and older can participate in the written and field exams. They must pass both exams to become SeeD. SeeD members are paid by the Garden according to their rank. In the Garden, their status is no different from that of the other students.

SeeD conducts missions around the world. Most missions involve battle support and undercover work. SeeD is in high demand by groups requiring a small force of undercover specialists. Commissions made through such dispatches are an important part of Balamb Garden`s income.

SeeD battle operations are noted for their skillful use of para-magic. Balamb Garden researches the use of GF in conjunction with para-magic. For this, Balamb Garden SeeD members master the most powerful forms of para-magic.
Shows your skill level as a SeeD. Higher ranks command a higher salary.

Exam to test your SeeD knowledge. After becoming a SeeD, you can take the tests in the Tutorial. There are up to 30 levels, with 10 questions each. All answers must be correct to go up a rank. However, you can only takes tests up to `s level.
A haven for orphans founded by Sorceress Edea and Headmaster Cid. Named for their wish to raise the seeds of the future in their garden.

A phenomenon beginning with Esthar`s silence 17 years ago. Almost all radio communication facilities were shut down because of noise across all frequencies. However, short transmissions are still possible. Believed to have some relation to the moon, but details are unknown.

Most countries now communicate through the use of HD cables running underground. However, many of these cables are cut off by monsters or in battle. Many countries are left without any means to communicate with each other.

Refers to monsters falling from the moon. Completely destroyed the cities of Centra. Occurs when monsters reach a saturation point on the moon. It`s believed that there are factors on the planet that cause this phenomenon. This phenonmenon has occured many times in history and will reoccur in the future.

Creatures on the moon. Monsters fall to earth at regular intervals. This phenomenon is called the Lunar Cry. The monsters bred on the planet since the last Lunar Cry make up those roaming the planet at this time. The Lunar Cry phenomenon also transformed some animals into monsters.

A civilization in Centra 4000 years ago. These Centra people immigrated to other continents and founded the Dollet Empire to the west and Esthar to the east. Centra was destroyed 80 years ago by the Lunar Cry.
A device to restrain sorceresses` power. Dr. Odine, afraid of Sorceress Adel`s power, created it. It looks like beautiful jewelry.

The legend goes that the Great Hyne created people. The sorceresses were given a fragment of Hyne`s own power. It`s hard to determine how many sorceresses exist today, for many keep their powers concealed. However, it is believed that they avoid spreading their power too thin.
Sorceress power has been passed throughout history by the process of embodiment. Any person who has the capacity to embody the great sorceress power is a candidate.
When a sorceress is about to die, she gives her power to the next person who 'inherits` her sorceress powers. According to Odine`s research, the power tends to weaken with each succession.

A crystal that causes the Lunar Cry by producing a strong energy field between the planet and the moon. It`s believed to have originated in the moon. The Crystal Pillar responds to a specific location on the planet, and sends a strong directional signal. More research is required to analyze this process in detail.

An enclosure for Crystal Pillar made by Esthar. 3 miles tall and 1.5 miles wide, the enormous enclosure boasts a high-tech facility. It floats by causing a reaction with the Crystal Pillar. A stone from the moon is sealed inside. It was probably built to cause the Lunar Cry through artificial means.

Lunar Cry`s point of origin determined by Esthar scientists. A security box restraining the power of the Crystal Pillar and ground energy field is set up. It is sealed to prevent the Crystal Pillar from entering the area.

A high-tech device intended for weakening and confining a sorceress` power. Shot into the moon`s orbit after going through a special sealing process. Used to confine Sorceress Adel. It is the main cause of radio interference on the planet.

Esthar`s space shuttle. Based on an ancient Centra legend of the Dragon Ship, Esthar`s finest scientific technology was used to build it. Esthar`s flagship, until it was used to send Adel`s Tomb into space.
Balamb Garden`s foundation. The original structure of Centra Shelter remains almost entirely intact. Entry is strictly forbidden.

(Later became the Garden building.) Ancient Centra people spread around the world after Centra was destroyed by the Lunar Cry. People used mobile Centra Shelters to move around the world. Many ruined shelters are found around the world.
A magazine representing the people`s voice. It was popular among aspiring young journalists. Shut down after Galbadia deemed the publication dangerous.

Julia Heartilly`s song. Julia married the Galbadian General Caraway after releasing “Eyes On Me“. Gave birth to a girl one year later. Julia died in a car crash at age 28, right before her daughter turned 5.
」Dr. Odine (The Great Hyne )White SeeD ·Moomba .Shumi Tribe ,Chocobo ~Mayor Dobe

Started as a monster researcher. Discovered Guardian Forces (GF). With the cooperation of a sorceress, became the first sorceress researcher. Analyzed the sorceress` magic, and created a method enabling a regular human being to use para-magic. Balamb Garden uses the principle of para-magic, combining it with GF`s power.
Creator of mankind, and believed to be the first sorceress. Calling a sorceress the Great Hyne`s descendant shows great respect.
Orphans formerly in the care of Sorceress Edea. They often travel on their ship, and are veiled in secrecy.
A mutation of some unknown animal. Details are unclear. Remembers people by licking their blood.

A small tribe living in the northern region. Basically gentle in temperament, they maintain a relaxed lifestyle. Shumis have big, long arms that change as they grow. The results vary depending on their environment.

They live in the 7 Chocobo forests around the World. Adults and children are called Chocobos and Chicobos respectively. Chicobos are spotted often, whereas Chocobos are rarely seen. Loved for their gentle nature, Chocobos respond quickly to Chicobos in danger.
The leader of Fishermans Horizon. A strict pacifist. Before coming to FH, used to be a scientist conducting energy research in Esthar.

Congratulations! Congratulations! You defeated the world`s strongest
monster, Omega Weapon
in Ultimecia Castle!
You are the finest fighter in the world!
Congratulations!! Congratulations!!
Junction enables characters to power up and use abilities.
A GF must be junctioned in order to power up and use abilities.
Let`s begin by junctioning a GF.
Right now, no GF is junctioned.
All other commands in gray cannot be selected yet.
the GF and Magic commands appear.
Since no GF is junctioned, Magic is displayed in gray.
Press to see abilities possessed by a GF.
The abilities are HP Junction, Vitality Junction, etc.
HP-J and Vit-J make the stats HP and Vit appear in white.
Magic can now be junctioned to HP and Vit.
But, since there is currently no magic, we will move onto
and 2 non-command abilities for characters and party.
A total of 5 abilities can be set.
Depending on the GF`s abilities, the maximum is 4 non-command abilities.
This means that up to 7 abilities can be set.
The top window is for Command abilities used during battle.
The bottom window is for character and party abilities.
Selecting the top window displays command abilities,
and selecting the bottom window displays character and party abilities.
Since there is currently no magic,
let`s set the command ability, Draw, to get some magic.
When an empty slot is chosen,
the cursor moves to the right.
Select Draw to set the command, Draw.
This is how command abilities used during battle are set.
Let`s add GF and Item to the list of command abilities.
Now GF and Item are set.
This concludes the tutorial. Thank you, and good luck.
By junctioning magic, you can raise the character`s stats.
If the GF has learned the ability
to junction onto stats, that particular stat will be displayed in white.
the GF and Magic commands will appear.
You are able to junction magic by selecting Magic.
Use the cursor to select which stat to junction.
choose a magic with the cursor.
You can see how the stat value changes with each magic.
the magic will be displayed next to the stat and the value will change.
Only one magic can be assigned to each stat.
there is no need to junction magic manually, one by one.
There are 3 commands to choose from.
Thus, magic can be junctioned easily by using Auto.
For example, let`s select the Atk junction.
Magic has been junctioned to favor Strength.
This concludes the Magic Junction tutorial.
Junction can change basic parameters such as Strength and Magic, as well as
By junctioning a GF with elemental junction ability,
the EL-A/D slot above HP turns white, indicating an elemental junction.
Elemental junction works like other junctions.
First, select a stat to junction,
then choose a magic to finish the junction.
However, non-elemental magic like Cure cannot be junctioned.
Elemental junction affects attack and defense differently.
links that element to a character`s Attack.
The % indicates how much of the attack`s damage is linked to that element.
At the maximum value of 100%, the Attack becomes entirely elemental.
In the example, Ice is at 50%; this means that damage only increases by 50%.
the damage from that element is reduced.
Reduction of damage is shown in %. At 100%, damage is reduced to 0.
In the example, fire damage is reduced to 20%, because Elem-Def is at 80%.
is displayed when the value goes over 100%, indicating that damage is absorbed.
In this state, you can absorb the amount of damage indicated in %.
In the example, 50% of fire damage is absorbed.
Multiple magic types can be junctioned to Elem-Def, depending on the GF`s ability.
Junction multiple magic types with the same elemental for a cumulative effect.
Try junctioning different magic to check the effect.
You can also select Auto to automatically junction the most effective elemental magic.
This concludes the Elemental Junction Tutorial.
By junctioning a GF with status junction ability,
the ST-A/D slot above HP turns white, indicating a status junction.
Status junction works the same way as elemental junction.
First, select a stat to junction,
then select a magic to complete the junction.
magic with no status change, like Fire, cannot be junctioned.
Status junction affects attack and defense differently.
gives that status change to Attack.
The status change probability is indicated in %.
In the example, there is a 90% chance of afflicting an enemy with Darkness.
100% is the maximum value, but there are enemies who may not be affected, even with 100% ST-Atk.
reduces the probability of status change.
Probability is displayed in %. No status change will occur at 100%.
In the example, the effect of Sleep attack is reduced by 80%.
However, depending on the enemy attack, status change may still occur at 100%.
You can junction multiple magic types to ST-Def, depending on the GF`s ability.
Some magic, like Esuna, will defend against multiple status changes.
Try junctioning different magic to check the effect.
Select Auto to junction the most effective status magic automatically.
This concludes the Status Junction Tutorial.
A GF will level up as it gains experience (EXP),
and learn new abilities by gaining AP (Ability Points).
EXP gained from battles automatically levels up the GF,
can be distributed, to learn different abilities.
Decide how to distribute the points.
Let`s go over how a GF can learn different abilities.
Select GF from the menu to display the GF acquired.
This displays its EXP, LV, and compatibility between characters, etc., but
Abilities in white, such as Str-J are abilities already learned,
while abilities in gray have not been learned yet.
shows the AP spent towards learning,
and the second number shows the AP required to complete.
Vit-J shows that 50 AP are required, of which 0 AP has been spent.
In order to learn the ability Elem-Atk-J,
Elem-Atk-J will then be displayed to the left, under Learning.
From here on, all AP gained will be used for Elem-Atk-J.
When all 160 AP are gained, Elem-Atk-J is learned.
Once an ability is learned, AP will
automatically move to an ability not yet learned.
With each learned ability comes a different set of abilities to learn.
The order of learning affects the GF`s powers.
it is recommended to return to this screen to set the next ability.
This concludes the tutorial. Thank you, and good luck.
The Status Screen displays each character`s basic data.
The first status screen shows stats such as HP, Str, etc.
The second screen shows all the status and elemental-related information.
The third status screen shows GF-related information.
The fourth status screen shows Limit Break information.
`s gunblade settings can be changed in the Limit Break screen.
There are two settings: Gunblade Auto Renzokuken Indicator
If you select Gunblade Auto to ON,
Renzokuken hits automatically without having to press .
However, a 'Perfect` may not be possible with this option. You must select OFF
and press manually at the right time.
the indicator will not be displayed during Renzokuken.
If the Gunblade Auto option is turned ON, the Renzokuken Indicator
Zell`s Limit Break settings can also be changed in the Status screen.
the Limit Break Duel will execute automatically.
The Limit Break moves listed on the screen are selected randomly.
That`s all for Zell`s Limit Break.
The tricks can learn are listed on the Status screen.
The fourth status screen lists all the tricks that can learn.
The gauge on the right indicates how much has been learned.
When the gauge is full, the trick has been learned.
If the gauge is not full, the trick has yet to be learned.
move the cursor to the trick name and press .
Now as walks around, the gauge will fill up, and will learn the trick.
If you select a trick that has already been learned,
there will be a message before you close this screen.
If there is still a trick to learn, be sure to select it.
You can learn new tricks by reading a magazine called Pet Pals.
After reading Pet Pals, access this screen to change the settings.
